methods.javadoc: @return true if this program's language supports pcode
methods.name: supportsPcode

return.comment: true if this program's language supports pcode

methods.name: getRegister
methods.comment: Translate the Varnode into a register if possible

return.comment: Register or null if node is not a register

methods.name: getVarnode
methods.comment: Get a varnode that maps to the given register

params.name: register
params.comment: register to translate into a varnode

methods.name: getRegisters
methods.comment:
Get all defined registers for the program this translator was created
 with.
